These are so soft and comfortable.  I’m pretty much living in these sets when I’m at home - because i’m lazy and don’t care a lot about formality.  They aren’t quite pajamas, so I can get away with checking the mail, answering the door, and even running to the grocery store or pharmacy in them.  That’s the kind of thing I value in a pair of pseudo-pajamas.  They wash pretty well.  I can see them wearing out pretty quick if i keep washing them a lot.  It’s not like they are made of super high quality fabric.  But I purchased a few different colors and I switch out.  They run slightly baggy.  And I will add that they are very thin material so they aren’t the best for going out in the snow.  Other than that, highly recommend.
